mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_inquiry_log (inq_no, cust_id, item_id, inq_title, inq_content, reg_dt, priv_fl, reply_content, reply_dt ) VALUES (#{inqNo}, #{custId}, #{itemId}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, #{regDt}, #{privFl}, #{replyContent}, #{replyDt})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.name FROM item_inquiry_log a JOIN customer b ON a.cust_id = b.cust_id WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
